questions.digital_transformation: What is Algeria's digital transformation initiative?
questions.api_access: How can developers access the APIs?
questions.data_types: What kind of data is available through the platform?

answers.digital_transformation: It's a comprehensive program aimed at modernizing public services, providing digital access to government resources, and fostering innovation in the technology sector.
answers.api_access: Developers can register through our developer portal to get API keys and access comprehensive documentation for all available services.
answers.data_types: We provide access to various types of public data including demographic statistics, economic indicators, and geographical information, all while ensuring privacy and security.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subject: Contact Request - New Algeria Digital Platform
contact.body:
Hello,

I am interested in learning more about the New Algeria Digital Platform.

Best regards,
